Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Something’s Gotta Give
Description: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Director.Name: Nancy Meyers
Director.Bio: Nancy Jane Meyers is an American filmmaker.

Title: Miss Sloane
Description: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: John Madden
Director.Bio: John Philip Madden is an English director of stage, film, television, and radio.

Title: Doctor Strange
Description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy films are films that belong to the fantasy genre with fantastic themes, usually magic, supernatural events, mythology, folklore, or exotic fantasy worlds.

Director.Name: Scott Derrickson
Director.Bio: Scott Derrickson is an American filmmaker.

Title: The Wolf of the Wall Street
Description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Director.Name: Martin Scorsese
Director.Bio: Martin Charles Scorsese is an American film director, producer, screenwriter and actor.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, interstellar travel, time travel, or other technologies.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is a British-American filmmaker. Known for his lucrative Hollywood blockbusters with complex storytelling, Nolan is considered a leading filmmaker of the 21st century.

Title: Dark Shadows
Description: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy films are films that belong to the fantasy genre with fantastic themes, usually magic, supernatural events, mythology, folklore, or exotic fantasy worlds.

Director.Name: Tim Burton
Director.Bio: Timothy Walter Burton is an American filmmaker and animator. He is known for his gothic fantasy and horror films.

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the spotless mind
Description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, interstellar travel, time travel, or other technologies.

Director.Name: Michel Gondry
Director.Bio: Michel Gondry is a French filmmaker noted for his inventive visual style and distinctive manipulation of mise en scène.

Title: American Beauty
Description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter’s best friend.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: To these ends, a primary element in a drama is the occurrence of conflict—emotional, social, or otherwise—and its resolution in the course of the storyline.

Director.Name: Sam Mendes
Director.Bio: Samuel Alexander Mendes is a British film and stage director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Holiday
Description: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other’s countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: Romance films or movies involve romantic love stories recorded in visual media for broadcast in theatres or on television that focus on passion, emotion, and the affectionate romantic involvement of the main characters.

Director.Name: Nancy Meyers
Director.Bio: Nancy Jane Meyers is an American filmmaker.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity’s survival.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, interstellar travel, time travel, or other technologies.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is a British-American filmmaker. Known for his lucrative Hollywood blockbusters with complex storytelling, Nolan is considered a leading filmmaker of the 21st century.
